channel.title: Video editing
channel.description:
I was wondering if anyone else here likes to video edit. And if you do could you show me some of your work. Originality doesn't come easy and the only way I can get ideas is from watching other videos and changing it to how I seize fit. I'm still learning my way around After Effects so I can only answer novice questions if you were wondering.
[u]Programs I use:[/u] Total Media Extreme Photoshop CS5 After Effects CS5 Sony Vegas Pro 11 Boujou
[u]Plug-Ins I use:[/u] Video Copilot Cycore FX Magic Bullet
Small clip of what I can do http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=v_vqRmRDNXI

item.title: Video editing
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

[quote=“TabbyKiller, post:6, topic:428804”][quote author=the elve age link=topic=531500.msg3883572#msg3883572 date=1326247221]
If you call this even decent editing:

But it was in 09
[/quote]
Mhm these days the expectations are 100x higher. 3d work is now required to get a “eh its good I guess.”[/quote]Haha I know I thought at least show something. For call of duty if it was that simple it would be horrible.

Read full topic

item.title: Video editing
item.dc:creator: @chillwitm888 chillwitm888
item.description:
@chillwitm888 wrote:

I do editing alot, with premiere/photoshop/vegaspro10
i didn’t use cinema 4d (for text) and AE alot because It is difficult, i mainly just use those two for something big like visual effects
i need alittle help but oh well
Plugins: too many to list

Read full topic

item.title: Video editing
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

I don’t necessarily enjoy the editing process, but I’ll add in fades and splits for my naruto videos sometimes. However, that is about it for editing. I’ve never actually added in any effects for my videos simply because I’ve never felt the need (or urge) to.

Your clip looks nice by the way. Rather generic, but very good. To be honest, I almost wish I could edit like that (but I’m stuck with Camtasia Studio 7 lol. Computer really can’t run Vegas efficiently at all).

Read full topic
